title: Pharmacy2u Mobile App
desc: I led a small team in developing the new Pharmacy2U app from the ground up. As an industry first, it empowers customers to manage their prescriptions and access a range of Pharmacy2U services directly. The app now serves over 400,000 users every month.

title: Shark.Net
desc: This is a paid commission to build a web application for the Manchester Sharks Waterpolo team website. It includes a CMS for managing Users, Blogs, Contact Messages and page content.

title: Viz-it
desc: Founder and lead developer for Vizit, a offline-first react native mobile app for James and John Timpson to review their stores.
